content: Monty BatesI’ve lived in the Fair City of St. Francis, aka San Francisco, for over 6 Decades, & Candlestick Park has NEVER been, & NEVER was Located in South San Francisco?! San Francisco is located off of 3rd Street in the City, the next small town nearest to SF is Brisbane?! Apparently you aren’t from NorCal, or you just like to make up Fake, Phony BS…Smdh.
